mapper.sql: order_id, payment, payment_type, post_fee, status, create_time, update_time, payment_time, consign_time, end_time, close_time, shipping_name, shipping_code, user_id, buyer_message, buyer_nick, buyer_comment
mapper.select: select receiver_name as username,payment as orderTotal,user_id as userId,receiver_phone as tel, receiver_address as streeName,`status` as orderStatus from tb_order o,tb_order_shipping os where o.`order_id` = #{id} and os.`order_id` = o.`order_id` and o.`user_id` = #{uid}

select order_id, payment, payment_type, post_fee, status, create_time, update_time, payment_time, consign_time, end_time, close_time, shipping_name, shipping_code, user_id, buyer_message, buyer_nick, buyer_comment from tb_order where user_id=#{userId} order by update_time desc
